news.title: OpenAI unveils new AI video model
news.summary: OpenAI released a new AI model capable of generating short-form videos optimized for social platforms.
news.shortsScript: OpenAI just launched a new AI model that creates short-form videos automatically. This could change YouTube Shorts forever.

news.title: Google expands AI-powered search summaries
news.summary: Google is rolling out AI-generated summaries directly in search results to improve user experience.
news.shortsScript: Google is adding AI summaries directly into search results. Faster answers, fewer clicks â€” search is changing.
